Name.label: Autosomal recessive leukoencephalopathy-ischemic stroke-retinitis pigmentosa syndrome

TextSection.Contents: A rare neurologic disease characterized by global developmental delay, intellectual disability, multiple ischemic lesions in brain MRI, behavioral abnormalities, dystonia, choreic movements and pyramidal syndrome, facial dysmorphism (hypertelorism, arched palate, macroglossia), retinitis pigmentosa, scoliosis, seizures.
